name: Mega Man-Revenge of Plant man
description:
★★★★★★★INSTRUCTIONS★★★★★★★

- Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump

- Space to fire your blaster

- Mobile Supported

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Fight enemies with your blaster and make your way to the end, with a boss battle against Plant Man, a robot master with a Plant Barrier to protect him from damage.

-Plant Man can't be damaged when he puts up his
PLANT BARRIER.
